events.message: The policyholder reported a car accident involving a collision with another vehicle on the highway at approximately 8:30 PM yesterday.
After reviewing the initial details, this claim was categorized under Auto Accident to ensure it is processed through the correct department.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to the case to provide dedicated support and guide the claimant through the process.
We sent a formal acknowledgment to the claimant confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and outlining the next steps.
Requested necessary documents including police report, vehicle registration, and photographs of the damage from the claimant for assessment.
Claimant submitted all requested documents promptly, including the police report and detailed photos of the vehicle damage.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted documents and gathering additional evidence from the accident site.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of fault and verification of claim validity based on available evidence.
A settlement offer was prepared and sent to the claimant detailing the compensation amount for vehicle repairs and associated costs.
The claimant responded expressing satisfaction with the settlement offer and appreciation for efficient handling of the claim.
The claim was formally approved following claimant's acceptance of the proposed settlement terms.
Payment for the approved claim was processed and issued to the claimantâ€™s bank account without delay.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after confirmation that payment was received and all case requirements were met.
All documentation and correspondence relating to the claim have been archived securely in compliance with company policy.
